page.title: 08"IN GRAINTHORPE".SADIE 7 yrs
page.content: In Grainthorpe, There are so many things I really can't keep up. In Grainthorpe, There are houses, With fields on every side, With gardens with lots of flowers in A lovely scent to smell. The bees buzz round the beehive, The blue birds tweet and sing, They are making such a lovely noise It makes my mind just ring. It's lovely in the garden, The sun is shining down, It is so very hot today I have to wipe my brow. The trees are blowing in the wind It's starting to get cold. It's been a lovely day today, The sun has been like gold. As I am tucked up in my bed I dream sweet dreams this night.
